column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The sourdough bread was excellent
column2: still warm and steaming when we tore it apart - top tier pre-appetizer stuff. The steaks were great as always. Both ribeye cuts are terrific and you can't go wrong with either. If you've tasted good truffle mac and cheese
column3: you know what the mac and cheese here tastes like. It was great and I would get it again. Lastly
column4: that lemon meringue pie - damn. Lemon meringue pie is always a letdown for me because my mother made a great one. After my taste of the chocolate cream pie
column5: I gave the lemon meringue a shot. It was the best I've ever had
column6: and the first that tops my old homemade one.
